source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a tranquil, snow-covered landscape at twilight. The camera pans across several wooden buildings, including a log cabin and a red house, all blanketed in deep snow. A few cars are parked nearby, and festive lights adorn a small tree and one of the cabins, adding a warm touch to the cold, wintry scene.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a tranquil, snow-covered landscape at twilight. The camera pans across several wooden buildings, including a log cabin and a red house, all blanketed in deep snow. A few cars are parked nearby, and festive lights adorn a small tree and one of the cabins, adding a warm touch to the cold, wintry scene.
